alert.note: Alert for Amite; Northern Hancock; Pearl River; Pike; Southern Hancock; Walthall; Wilkinson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 16 at 9:11AM CST until January 17 at 10:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM CST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...For the first Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as zero degrees. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 5 degrees. * WHERE...In Louisiana, Pointe Coupee and West Feliciana Parishes. In Mississippi, Wilkinson County. * WHEN...For the first Wind Chill Advisory, until noon CST today. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to 10 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Very cold temperatures and wind chills can lead to hypothermia if proper clothing is not worn.
info.instruction: Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. While the wintry precipitation has ended, icy conditions will persist on some bridges for another few hours. Avoid travel if possible. Continue to exercise extreme caution if you must go out, especially if you have to cross any bridges.

area.areaDesc: Amite; Northern Hancock; Pearl River; Pike; Southern Hancock; Walthall; Wilkinson
